data.description:
Since there are so many types of weapons, there are an equally large number of ammunition types. Depending upon the weapons the wearer carries, a bandolier may contain energy cells or power packs (blasters), clips (slugthrowers), explosive bolts (bowcasters), magazines (missile launchers), grenades, knives, or any other forms of ammunition.

Model: Ayelixe/Krongbing textiles Bandolier

Type: Bandolier

Scale: Character

Cost: 300

Availability: 2

Game Notes: A bandolier has 12 slots that can each hold a single small weapon (such as a grenade or a knife) or a single piece of equipment weighing up to about 0.5 kg. Any item on the bandolier can be retrieved as a non-roll action.
data.label: OD6S.CHAR_GEAR
